postcss-merge-rules

Merge CSS rules with PostCSS.

Install

With npm do:

npm install postcss-merge-rules --save

Examples

This module will attempt to merge adjacent CSS rules:

By declarations

Input

```css a { color: blue; font-weight: bold }

p { color: blue; font-weight: bold } ```

Output

css a,p { color: blue; font-weight: bold }

By selectors

Input

```css a { color: blue }

a { font-weight: bold } ```

Output

css a { color: blue; font-weight: bold }

By partial declarations

Input

```css a { font-weight: bold }

p { color: blue; font-weight: bold } ```

Output

```css a,p { font-weight: bold }

p { color: blue } ```

Usage

See the PostCSS documentation for examples for your environment.

Contributing

Pull requests are welcome. If you add functionality, then please add unit tests to cover it.
